verbose_text: The present study was the first, to the best of our knowledge, to demonstrate that high-dose APAP reduced the survival rate of hMSCs, induced the JNK / p38 MAPK signaling pathways and activated the caspase-9/-3 apoptotic death pathway.
evidence: APAP reduced the survival rate of hMSCs, induced the JNK/p38 MAPK signaling pathways and activated the caspase-9/-3
